title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Language Learning Program: Short-Term Intensive Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structures and beginner-level practical experience
context.additional_context: Language education course applying cognitive load management strategies by combining smartphone-based mobile learning with face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can systematically deconstruct core language concepts and explain cognitive processing stages at three or more levels
Learners can accurately reconstruct language learning materials at over 80% accuracy by applying information presentation methods that account for limited working memory capacity
Learners can propose language problem-solving approaches using cognitive load optimization strategies through project-based assignments

resources: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Language Learning Kit
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
